#A draft set of required, recommended, and optional Dublin Core metadata elements to be used to annotate SSIII ontologies

= Dublin Core Reference Documents =

[http://dublincore.org/ Dublin Core Metadata Initiative Home Page]

[http://dublincore.org/2010/10/11/dcelements.rdf# Dublin Core RDF (DC-RDF) document]


= SSIII DC Element Set =

These elements would be in addition to available RDF/OWL annotations, including:  rdfs:comment, owl:deprecated, owl:incompatibleWith, rdfs:isDefinedBy, rdfs:label, owl:priorVersion, rdfs:seeaAlso, owl:versionInfo

== Required ==

[http://dublincore.org/2010/10/11/dcelements.rdf#creator Creator]: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.

[http://dublincore.org/2010/10/11/dcelements.rdf#creator Rights]: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

[http://dublincore.org/2010/10/11/dcelements.rdf#source Source]: The described resource may be derived from the related resource in whole or in part. Recommended best practice is to identify the related resource by means of a string conforming to a formal identification system.

[http://dublincore.org/2010/10/11/dcelements.rdf#date Source]: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.{{{Note: this information could be inferred using owl:versionInfo contstructs }}}
